title: CompetitionConfig
description: WCIF extension with additional competition configuration.

localNamesFirst.description: A flag indicating whether to swap competitor latin names with local ones in generated PDF documents.

scorecardsBackgroundUrl.description: URL of an image to be placed in the background of scorecards.

competitorsSortingRule.description: Indicates how competitors should be assigned to groups.

noTasksForNewcomers.description: A flag indicating whether newcomers should be assigned any tasks.

tasksForOwnEventsOnly.description: A flag indicating whether competitors should be assigned tasks only in events they registered for.
